methods: abstract void onKey(int primaryCode, int[] keyCodes) Send a key press to the listener.
abstract void onPress(int primaryCode) Called when the user presses a key.
abstract void onRelease(int primaryCode) Called when the user releases a key.
abstract void onText(CharSequence text) Sends a sequence of characters to the listener.
abstract void swipeDown() Called when the user quickly moves the finger from up to down.
abstract void swipeLeft() Called when the user quickly moves the finger from right to left.
abstract void swipeRight() Called when the user quickly moves the finger from left to right.
abstract void swipeUp() Called when the user quickly moves the finger from down to up.
